website_summaries.verdict: A sheer, lightweight powder that covers fine lines, boasting a soft-focus finish.
pros: Versatile enough for all skin tones
Works as a finisher for both powder and liquid foundations
cons: Not all customers like the slightly rose-tinted hue

customer_reviews.title: This is not the original. It is the tinted.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for many many years. This mineral veil is the tinted form the. There is no color in the original. You can see the photo. The lg container is the original color the small is what was sent
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Last step after make-up
customer_reviews.text: I put it on after blush, foundation, concealer, after everything it’s the last step. It blends everything leaving ur face looking like it was just photo-shopped. Beautiful. And has SPF!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly R.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: How hard is it to put the correct item ordered into a mailer. Really disappointing. P

customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I had acne it covered it . Great product

product_meta.title: Bare Escentuals BareMinerals Original SPF25 Mineral Veil - 6g/0.21oz
product_meta.description: A lightweight fluid makeup that gives skin airbrushed perfection Instantly melts into skin & evens out skin tone Protects skin from harmful UVA/UVB rays Avoid the formation of wrinkles & dark spots Minimizes lines, absorbs oils & softens your complex
